name: Probability-uncertain-report
body:
# walk|run

## fea 12 mod maxabs minabs [mean std max min]


x y train (683, 12) (683,)
x y test (171, 12) (171,)

### gmm
* pred total_test (171,)
* predict class1:dic {0: 51, 1: 10}
* predict class2:dic {0: 28, 1: 82}
* accuracy gmm 0.777777777778
* wrong (38,)
* probability (38, 2)

### lr
* accuracy lr 0.912280701754
* wrong (15,)
* prob (15, 2)

visualize 
[https://shimo.im/doc/aI7fVAGxROyjyGWP](https://shimo.im/doc/aI7fVAGxROyjyGWP)




# 试过的和没试过的
* 坐着拿着手机乱动容易识别成driving,试试大的window_size like 100 150
* 排除了的模型：gmm lr  nn adaboost gbdt rf svm还没试过的模型fm
* 排除了的特征：fea21(noise)磁场(noise) fea4x3 fea50x3  还没试过的特征speed gyro 加速传感器的频域什么的
* 磁场数据在 car, bus, subway, elevator ,riding, 大街上走路, 桌子上金属等  什么样子
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
